page.title: 12 FELINDRE SHOW AND SPORTS
page.content: Every year on the third Saturday in June,the Felindre Show and Sports is held on a field at Rhyd-y-cwm Farm Felindre. The event begins with a fancy dress procession when competitors parade through the village to be judged at Felindre Village Hall. On the sports field there are football rounders and tug -of-war comptitions for several age groups, children's races, displays of various kinds including motor cycle kick-start demonstrations, karate, vintage steam traction engines and dog - handling. There is a dog-show and there are many fair-type stalls and side-shows. The event is organised by the Village Hall Committee and the money made helps run the Village Hall.
